overview: At the end of an extraordinary situation in the village, when the people of the village cannot reach the government, they try to break a curse by organizing various rituals under the leadership of the Mukhtar and Kadir. After a while, the government official who comes to the village will confront the villagers with another reality in an authoritarian manner.
tagline: At the end of an extraordinary situation in the village, when the people of the village cannot reach the government, they try to break a curse.
title: THE GAS
